name: Carcará: Asas da Justiça
summary:
Carcará: Asas da Justiça is a visual investigation novel with battles in court. Follow the adventure of a lawyer who seeks to bring justice to those who need it most! Fábio Carcará is a young idealistic lawyer who seeks to help those most in need. Help him do justice in this game focused on logical challenges, with an incredible story!

Perform investigations and collect evidence that will be useful during hearings. Question witnesses about their testimonies and expose their lies using evidence. Face ruthless, shrewd and eccentric lawyers in an exclusive battle system! Carcará features in-depth characters with interesting and charismatic background stories.
